title: Premium Productivity Dashboard
description: A modern productivity dashboard built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It includes a Todo List, Daily Planner, Pomodoro timer, Daily Goals tracker, motivational quotes, theme toggle, optimized images, and smooth UI interactions.

title: Xpert Home Appliance Repair
description: A professional service website for home appliance repair built with a clean and responsive UI. It helps users quickly book repair services, explore available solutions, and contact technicians easily through a fast, user-friendly experience.
